name: ABC
text:
Red Cross workers in Brazil walk down the street disinfecting a sidewalk in Nova Friburgo as cases of the novel coronavirus continue to rise.

Brazil has been hardest hit by the COVID-19 pandemic in Latin America. https://t.co/mYM18iaVsj https://t.co/PMIozidrrh

name: ABC
text: Microsoft becomes the third big tech company this week to say it won’t sell its facial recognition software to police, following similar moves by Amazon and IBM. https://t.co/polIYiud1A

name: ABC
text: NICK OF TIME: Security cameras capture the moment when a New Jersey police officer saves and EMT who was choking on food. https://t.co/33ps19fHB5 https://t.co/uh8JKrZnna

name: ABC
text: MORE: While the convention will still be held in Charlotte, North Carolina, from Aug. 24-27, the acceptance speech will now be held at the VyStar Veterans Memorial Arena in Jacksonville, which holds 15,000 people. https://t.co/ZdE6lKUGzo

name: ABC
text:
RNC Chair Ronna McDaniel: “We are thrilled to celebrate this momentous occasion in the great city of Jacksonville."

"Not only does Florida hold a special place in Pres. Trump’s heart as his home state, but it is crucial in the path to victory in 2020." https://t.co/ZdE6lKUGzo https://t.co/pPQISID5jI

name: ABC
text: The Louisville Metro Council unanimously passed Breonna's Law, outlawing "no-knock" warrants and requiring body cameras be turned on before and after every search. https://t.co/5ndGUTlaPc

name: ABC
text: Archaeologists discover what they believe to be one of the earliest playhouses in London, which may date back over 450 years ago. https://t.co/TI3wejzuAI

name: ABC
text: Tyson Foods shares fall after the company said it is cooperating with a federal investigation into price-fixing in the chicken industry. https://t.co/mzsQwnCdqy

name: ABC
text: Darrell "Bubba" Wallace Jr. says he's "really proud" of NASCAR for "stepping up" and banning the Confederate flag from all its events. https://t.co/tREdD7Yqfh https://t.co/LGQ6AA78Yi
